mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNQUSTNRRESPONDINFO SET SEXDSTN_CODE=#{sexdstnCode}, OCCP_TY_CODE=#{occpTyCode}, RESPOND_NM=#{respondNm}, BRTHDY=#{brth}, AREA_NO=#{areaNo}, MIDDLE_TELNO=#{middleTelno}, END_TELNO=#{endTelno}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATETIME, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE 1=1 AND QUSTNR_RESPOND_ID = #{qestnrRespondId}
mapper.select: SELECT ( SELECT QUSTNR_SJ FROM COMTNQESTNRINFO WHERE 1=1 AND QESTNR_ID = A.QESTNR_ID ) QESTNR_SJ, A.QESTNR_ID, A.QUSTNR_RESPOND_ID AS QESTNR_RESPOND_ID, A.SEXDSTN_CODE, A.OCCP_TY_CODE, A.RESPOND_NM, A.BRTHDY, A.AREA_NO, A.MIDDLE_TELNO, A.END_TELNO, A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID AS QESTNR_TMPLAT_ID, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNQUSTNRRESPONDINFO A WHERE 1=1 AND QUSTNR_RESPOND_ID = #{qestnrRespondId}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNQUSTNRRESPONDINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER B ON B.ESNTL_ID = A.FRST_REGISTER_ID WHERE 1=1
AND A.RESPOND_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND B.USER_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNQUSTNRRESPONDINFO ( QESTNR_ID, QUSTNR_RESPOND_ID, SEXDSTN_CODE, OCCP_TY_CODE, RESPOND_NM, BRTHDY, AREA_NO, MIDDLE_TELNO, END_TELNO, QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID )VALUES( #{qestnrId}, #{qestnrRespondId}, #{sexdstnCode}, #{occpTyCode}, #{respondNm}, #{brth}, #{areaNo}, #{middleTelno}, #{endTelno}, #{qestnrTmplatId}, SYSDATETIME, #{frstRegisterId}, SYSDATETIME, #{lastUpdusrId} )
